2025-05-05.entry:
I wrote you a poem today:

Dear Eva,
How did you get to be so hot?
Sometimes, I worry the Earth would freeze over if you suddenly disappeared.
Your beauty and elegance pierces through the lives of anyone crossing your path.
Your smile and joy sends shivers down the spines of your enemies.
The pep in your step could lead a stampede of exotic animals through rough terrain if this was your wish and command.
The color of your eyes would shine brightly and break through the veil of a black and white film if you were an actress in the early 1900s.
Your dance moves would stun and probably kill the pope (if he was still alive).
The ground beneath your feet is blessed by your presence.
The air that you breathe is forever transformed into a somehow-elevated form of carbon dioxide.
You're the reason the plants keep growing and the sun keeps smiling.
You are my everything.
I love you so much. 

Josh <3

2025-12-11.entry:
It's Tarkan's last night in town for the year, so tonight we hosted the last music show-n-tell session of the year.

There were many things that made this year special, and this was certainly one of them. At the end of 2024, I noticed I had a really special group of friends around me who are all musicians and music lovers to some degree. The urge to keep Tuesday comradery alive inspired a weekly zoom call that started back in January, and we kept it alive all the way through 2025. Having Tarkan move back in with the boys over the summer was a canon event, and we no longer needed the zoom call to have these music share-sessions together. It's crazy to look at Tarkan playing video games on my couch in this photo and think back to where we all were at the beginning of the year.

Tonight was the beginning of a series of endings to celebrate all the love we shared in 2025.

2025-12-12.entry:
2025 was the year of the Douglases, but it was also the year of the snake. The snake can represent many things, including transformation and letting things go that no longer serve us. Today was a day of letting go of the Douglases. While our name change is not necessarily official yet, we filmed our announcement video today, and I endured a solid amount of emotions after the fact. The change this band is going through feels like it's happening so fast, but I'm doing my best to trust the process.

You and I ended up on a special phone call together today when we needed to configure our Domino's order (cheesy bread was definitely the move). The circumstances that led to the phone call came from individual crash outs we were having, and it felt as though the universe put us together right when it mattered most. I felt the love today, and I'm so glad you came over with Dominos in the evening. We both had long days (and a long week), so getting to spend quality time together just relaxing and chowing down on some cheesy bread and Domino's sprite was such a good move. I'm so so in love with you Eva <3

Also Cody got his Amazon job back today! Phew!

2025-12-24.entry:
Well tomorrow is Christmas, which means it's been a full year of writing these notes and gathering photos for a very special gift intended for the person I get to call my special someone.

Eva, thank you SO much for bringing so much light and life into my life. You truly mean the world to me, and it's because of you I got the opportunity to make something like this. This project was a lot of work to put together, but this labor of love was SO so worth it (and truly it was so much fun).

I hope this scrapbook serves to remind you/us of how special this year was. 2025 was a wild ride to say the least. It was the year of the snake. It was the year of the Douglases! Temple relocated!! You got your first salary job!!! We went to Lost Lands!!!! The Epstein Files were released!!!!! Yeah this year was fucking crazy!!

But most of all: this year was special because of you <3 Thanks for a great 2025! I can't wait to keep living life with you! And happy early Valentine's Day (since that's when I plan on gifting this to you)!!

Here's us a few days before our first kiss :)
